review:
Dr Abhishek Arora is perfect in his work. Accurate to the core. Besides top class quality and professionalism that he offers, he is also very polite, humble and explains everything clearly, leaving the patient with absolutely no doubts. Above all, his services are very affordable. One just does not need to worry about being overcharged for dental treatments here. ** ** ****** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ****** I would highly recommend Dr Arora Dentistry to everyone who is looking for top class service at affordable price. 

Sangeeta Kapoor
Delhi

review: The doctor is awesome and friendly and he understood my problem relating to my teeth.  I trust him and so I travelled all the way to Malviya Nagar and in traffic it takes me about 2 hours during peak hours. Going to Arora clinic was a great experience. He is a fantastic doctor.  Every one should visit him as I find him as an expert in his field. Great going experience with my teeth. My family had a great experience with him but dental treatment is always costly. If my personal reviews matters the dental treatment should have been slightly cheaper as it is expensive and we can't get it claimed by the medical insurance companies.

review: Dr Abhishek did my implant guided surgery yesterday very smoothly and efficiently in 20 minutes. It was like a magic. I visited him for the first time regarding this surgery. The best thing about Dr Abhishek is that first he answers all your queries and then explains his plans. Patient feels ease with the doctor. During surgery he informed step by step what he will do next. I think Doctors like Abhishek makes our life very easy.. Thank you so much Dr Abhishek for your humble support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Extracting wisdom tooth was one thing which have always scared me.But finally i have done my wisdom tooth extraction in Dr Abhishek 's clinic.It went so smoothly and within half an hour it was done.It was not at all painful as I thought.Dr Abhishek 's friendly nature and the way his explanation about wisdom tooth extraction was so positive that i was convinced and finally done it. Thanks doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my wisdom tooth removed for the first time and it was a very smooth experience. Unlike what I have usually heard, there was no pain while or after the procedure. Dr. Abhishek makes you understand the procedure before getting into it which makes you quite confident and relaxed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr. Abhishek Arora was extremely satisfactory. The line of treatment he suggested was completely in accordance with what was best for me. I had visited few more dentists and they were suggesting expensive and not necessary procedures but after visiting Dr. Arora I had the best line of treatment and I will recommend him to everyone. Apart from the splendid treatment he provides he is also a very well spoken and courteous human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Just want to say thank you so much to a wonderful compassionate doctor, Dr. Abhishek Arora. I always feel well cared for. Thank you for being a super doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met a few dentists before who suggested me an expensive RCT for the cavity issue. Apparently, I was about to apply for a loan when I heard about Dr. Abhishek. Turns out, what I thought might need an RCT, was actually a matter of dental filling and no anesthesia shots were required either. You see, that is what I'm talking about, 'honesty'.
